# James Lang powered by #U

This is the core of the James Lang AI system, built entirely from scratch with no external dependencies. It represents a fundamental shift in how AI is developed, focusing on self-sufficiency and innovation.

## Introduction

James Lang is a revolutionary AI framework designed for maximum flexibility and performance. This core package provides the foundational elements for all James Lang applications, enabling complex computations and intelligent decision-making without relying on third-party libraries.

## Core Concepts

*   **Self-Contained Architecture:** Every component is built in-house, ensuring complete control and understanding of the system's behavior.
*   **AI-Native Design:** The architecture is optimized for AI workloads, from data processing to model execution.
*   **Scalability:** Designed to scale from small projects to enterprise-level deployments.

## Getting Started

Since James Lang is dependency-free, installation is straightforward. You can integrate the core components directly into your project.

For development purposes, you can clone the repository and build the core components locally.

```sh
# Clone the James Lang repository
git clone https://github.com/your-repo/james-lang.git

# Navigate to the core directory
cd james-lang/packages/core

# Build the core components (example command, actual build process may vary)
make build
```

## Usage

The James Lang core provides APIs for various AI tasks. Refer to the comprehensive documentation for detailed usage examples.
